# Strided
- Normally S = 1
- S>1 -> [Downsampling](Downsampling.qmd)
- Dilated
- Spaces in the filter kernel
- D = 1 : normal [Conv](Conv.qmd) aka D-1 spaces
- Effective Filter size : $$\hat F = F + (F-1)(D-1)$$
